init.title: Stremio Options
init.description: Configure update intervals, polling behavior, streaming preferences, and Apple TV handover settings.

data_description.player_scan_interval: How often to check for player state changes (10-300 seconds)
data_description.library_scan_interval: How often to sync library data (60-3600 seconds)
data_description.polling_gate_entities: Select media players or other entities that control polling. When all selected entities are off/idle, polling is reduced to once per 24 hours. Leave empty to always poll at normal intervals.
data_description.enable_apple_tv_handover: Allow sending content to Apple TV
data_description.handover_method: Method to use: 'auto' or 'airplay' (recommended, requires pyatv), 'direct' (may work for HLS). Note: VLC deep links do NOT work on tvOS!
data_description.apple_tv_device: The name of your Apple TV for AirPlay (e.g., 'Living Room Apple TV'). Required for AirPlay method.
data_description.apple_tv_entity_id: The media_player entity ID for Direct handover (e.g., 'media_player.apple_tv_living_room')
data_description.show_copy_url: Show 'Copy URL' option when browsing streams in the media browser. Disable to reduce clutter.
data_description.default_catalog_source: The addon to use for fetching metadata (e.g., 'cinemeta', 'tmdb'). Leave as 'cinemeta' for default.
data_description.addon_stream_order: Select addons in your preferred order. Streams from addons listed first will appear at the top. Leave empty to use Stremio's default order.
data_description.reset_addon_order: Check this box to clear the custom addon order and use Stremio's default order.
data_description.stream_quality_preference: Preferred stream quality. Matching streams will be shown first. Select 'any' to show all streams without filtering.
data_description.create_testing_dashboard: Check this box to create a comprehensive testing dashboard with all Stremio card types. The dashboard will be accessible from the sidebar.

get_upcoming_episodes.name: Get Upcoming Episodes
get_upcoming_episodes.description: Get air dates for upcoming episodes of series in your library.

days_ahead.name: Days Ahead
days_ahead.description: Number of days to look ahead for upcoming episodes (1-30).

get_recommendations.name: Get Recommendations
get_recommendations.description: Get personalized content recommendations based on your library preferences.

media_type.name: Media Type
media_type.description: Filter recommendations by type (movie or series). Leave empty for both.

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of recommendations to return.

get_similar_content.name: Get Similar Content
get_similar_content.description: Get similar movies or shows based on a specific media item.

media_id.name: Media ID
media_id.description: The IMDB ID of the media item to find similar content for.

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of similar items to return.
